name: e-Voting-with-Blockchain
details: Blockchain-based e-voting implementation built with Python (smart contracts and supporting tooling).

name: Vue-Dashboard-using-Charts.Js
description: Dashboard built with Vue and Chart.js
details: Interactive dashboard built using Vue.js and Chart.js to visualize data with responsive charts and widgets.

name: BitVote-A-Block-Chain-Voting-Application
description: Decentralized voting app using Ethereum smart contracts
details: BitVote is a decentralized voting application implemented with Ethereum smart contracts and a JavaScript frontend.

name: Dogs-API-Vue-App
description: Simple Vue dashboard using Dogs API
details: A lightweight Vue.js application that consumes the Dogs API to display images and breed information in a dashboard layout.

name: ShopShot-React-Native
description: React Native app with Firebase backend
details: Cross-platform React Native app using Firebase Firestore to list and manage products with offline capabilities.

name: Done-With-It
details: A simple React Native marketplace app for selling used items, featuring listing, image uploads, and basic chat.

name: Buy4Free-Ecommerce-Website
details: Traditional server-rendered e-commerce site built with PHP, MySQL and Bootstrap for front-end layout.
